system.description: The character has achieved perfect coordination with dual weapons, wielding them as extensions of their own body.
system.benefit: When armed with two single-handed weapons (such as pistols or one-handed melee weapons), they ignore the -20 penalty for Two-Weapon Fighting

prerequisites.text: Agility 45, Ambidextrous, BS 40 or WS 40, Two Weapon Wielder (Melee, Ranged)

specialAbilities.name: No Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty
specialAbilities.description: When wielding two single-handed weapons, ignore the -20 Two-Weapon Fighting penalty.
